text: avar uṅkaḷai'talāk' colli viṭṭāl, uṅkaḷai viṭac ciṟanta - muslimkaḷāṉa, muḥmiṉāṉa, (iṟaivaṉukku) vaḻipaṭṭu naṭappavarkaḷāṉa, tavpā ceypavarkaḷāṉa, vaṇaṅkupavarkaḷāṉa, nōṉpu nōṟpavarkaḷāṉa - kaṉṉimai kaḻintavar, iṉṉum kaṉṉip peṇṭir - ittakaiyavarai avaruṭaiya iṟaivaṉ avarukku (uṅkaḷukkup) pakaramāka, maṉaiviyarāy koṭukkap pōtumāṉavaṉ
